pageContext.claim: “And this whistle blower, what's going on with the IG? How come the IG brings a whistle blower forward?”
pageContext.analysis: The intelligence community's inspector general, Michael Atkinson, had a mostly ministerial role in processing the Ukraine whistleblower's complaint. Federal law required him to determine whether the Aug. 12 complaint regarding President Trump's request that Ukraine investigate Joe Biden appeared to be credible.
